### Welcome to the RAML API portal for the <a href="http://azure.microsoft.com/​" target="_blank"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="24px"> Azure Table Storage API</a>! 

This portal provides 
- a [RAML spec](/apiplatform/repository/public/organizations/30/apis/8112/versions/8308/files/root) describing the Azure Table Storage API in a clear, human- and machine-readable format
- [documentation](/apiplatform/popular/#/portals/apis/8112/versions/8308/pages/7002) of the Azure Table Storage API auto-generated from the RAML spec
- the [documentation](/apiplatform/popular/#/portals/apis/8112/versions/8308/pages/7002) is live: you can make calls to the Azure Table Storage API from the documentation
- live, documented usecases for the Instagram API, provided as API notebooks, and exercising much of the Azure Table Storage API

_This portal is built on the Anypoint Platform for APIs, using RAML version 0.8._

_For more information about RAML, see [http://raml.org](http://raml.org)._

_The API notebooks are all executable! Hit "enter" in any code cell to execute it (and all cells before it that have not executed yet), or scroll to the bottom of the notebook and click "Play notebook". For more information, see [http://apinotebook.com](http://apinotebook.com)._

---
### Please note:

This portal and its contents are not affiliated with Microsoft Azure. They are, however, useful for working with, and learning about, the Azure Table Storage API.

The official developer API portal for Azure Table Storage is at <a href="http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179423.aspx​" target="_blank">http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dd179423.aspx​</a>
